Profile Contacts

Internet

What is the Internet?The internet is a heterogenious (network of networks) comprising of networks such as wide area network ,cellular networks e.g GPRS ,gigspeed networks ..e.t.c

WAN

wide area network is a networks of computers over a large area like the globe ,The facebook is an example of the wide area network.

MAN

metropolitan areas like cities can have a computerised interconnection via The MAN.
